channel.title: Slayer Points Saving Wrong
channel.description:
I was wondering how do I fix this.
When I open a char file it saves the slayerpoints as: slayPoint 0 it needs to save as slayPoints = 0 . Any ideas? Also, how do I give the items in my slayer shop A certain price?
From my limited Java experience I'm guessing this is the code that handles doing that. See anything wrong with it?
[code] characterfile.write("slay-points = ", 0, 12); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.slayPoints), 0, Integer.toString(p.slayPoints).length()); characterfile.newLine();[/code]
EDIT: I fixed the first part. I had to change 12 to 14.
